Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xmljson.converters.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities Class contains methods for file read/write and Json reading and xml from json conversion.

      static java.lang.String jsonValueToXml(javax.json.JsonValue jsonValue, java.lang.String key)
      jsonValueToXml recursively traverses through the given JsonValue and converts it into an xml string
      static java.lang.String readFile(java.io.File file)
      readFile reads from the given file and returns a String containing the contents of the file
      static void writeFile(java.io.File file, java.lang.String text)
      writeFile writes to the given file from an input String
      static java.lang.String xmlConverter(java.lang.String json)
      xmlConverter reads json from an input string and converts it to JsonObject or JsonArray based on the initial token '[' or '{'

    • Method Detail

      • jsonValueToXml

        public static java.lang.String jsonValueToXml(javax.json.JsonValue jsonValue,
                                              java.lang.String key)
        jsonValueToXml recursively traverses through the given JsonValue and converts it into an xml string
        Parameters:
        jsonValue - JsonValue object which can be a json object, array, string, number, true, false or null.
        key - Key corresponding to jsonValue
        Returns:
        String containing the xml converted from json

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile(java.io.File file)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        readFile reads from the given file and returns a String containing the contents of the file
        Parameters:
        file - Input file to be read from.
        Returns:
        String containing the contents of the input file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(java.io.File file,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        writeFile writes to the given file from an input String
        Parameters:
        file - Output file to write to.
        text - String containing the contents to write to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • xmlConverter

        public static java.lang.String xmlConverter(java.lang.String json)
        xmlConverter reads json from an input string and converts it to JsonObject or JsonArray based on the initial token '[' or '{'
        Parameters:
        json - String containing the json read from file
        Returns:
        String containing the xml converted from json
